## hpr3622 :: My Network Setup.

 Sgoti's Network Documentation.
Device List.

Device01, TP-Link ER605
Device02, TP-Link TL-SG2210P V3
Device03, TP-Link EAP660 HD
Device04, TP-Link Omada Hardware Controller

Server List.

Server01, SGOTI@HQBAK

AMD x86 FX w/ 1 SATA III 2.5" Seagate 240Gig
2 SATA III 3.5" Western Digital Red 8TB

Server02, NASPi

Pi4 model B, 8Gig, Geekworm NASPi w/ SATA III 2.5" 1TB

Server03, ArgonOne

Pi4 model B, 8Gig, ArgonOne w/ m.2 Western Digital Blue 500Gig

Server04, DEVPi

Pi4 model B, 4Gig

Server05, ZeroHero01

Pi Zero 2 W w/ microSD 128Gig


LAN.

IP Block: 192.168.0.1/24

Gateway: 192.168.0.1
